QuestData.Title: Warp-Raider Nesaad
QuestData.Description: Warp-Raider Nesaad must be dealt with! I have no idea how he survived my attack, but he cannot be allowed to continue his operation out there.$B$BGo back and take out Nesaad. He keeps a small ethereal camp near the southwestern corner of the Heap.$B$BDon't fail like I did, $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Warp-Raider Nesaad and then return to Nether-Stalker Khay'ji at Area 52 in the Netherstorm.
QuestData.CompletionText: It's over then? Warp-Raider Nesaad is dead?
QuestData.RewardText: It's a relief to hear that scum is finally dealt with. You do good work, $n... may I be so forward as to call you by your name?$B$BIf you're willing, I have another task that needs doing. One that is very important and someone of your obvious skill should be able to handle with ease.
